name: VideoMeet
description: Government-backed video conferencing platform focusing on Aatmanirbhar positioning

opengraph.title: Video& Audio Conferencing App, Screen Sharing, Webinars, - VideoMeet
opengraph.description: VideoMeet is an online Video Conferencing app and collaborative services including webinars (web seminars), webcasts, Screen Sharing, web meetings, and an online training program.
